summary: Backend escape-attempt handling was updated to be probabilistic (usually blocked, sometimes successful) with new in-universe action-style responses. Escape text no longer uses “dark latex”. A separate change updated project_state.json summary text, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json project summary text to mention escape being sometimes possible.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for backend behavior/text updates; it did not request updating project metadata/state summaries.
